newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Dharmala Insurance sees 11 bln rph net.
newsitem.headline: Dharmala Insurance sees 11 bln rph net.

text.p: Indonesian small-sized general insurance firm PT Dharmala Insurance said on Friday it expected to post a net profit of 11 billion rupiah in 1997 against 7.2 billion rupiah in 1996.
Dharmala said in a statement issued after the firm's shareholders meeting on Friday that it expected to book gross premiums of 120 billion rupiah in 1997 against 87.97 billion rupiah in 1996.
Dharmala said its shareholders approved a proposed dividend payment of 100 rupiah per share for 1996 against 60 rupiah for 1995 at the meeting.
The rise in dividend payment was achieved despite a decision in 1996 to split the nominal value of the stock to 500 rupiah from 1,000 rupiah per share, it said.
